alert.note: Alert for Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 4:11AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches today, little accumulation tonight, and an additional 4 to 8 inches Saturday afternoon through Saturday night. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph today. * WHERE...In Idaho, Lower Treasure Valley ID and Upper Treasure Valley zones. In Oregon, Oregon Lower Treasure Valley zone. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A break in the snow is expected tonight night before more snow arrives by Saturday afternoon. Those with travel plans this weekend should pay close attention to the forecast and consider not traveling if possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
